name: Destinata - Black Edition - EN
description:
Destinata Black Edition is a short Demo version of the project. You can play with Ladia, a young girl who suddenly is intercepted with strange feelings, thoughtful aparitions, and great memory loss.  In this demo you will experience:
  • Hand drawn animations.
  • Pixel art with some HD quality.
  • Adjustable gameplay.
  • The first spicy bossfight.
  • Fast paced platforming.
  • Two magic abilities.

The game´s length varies around 20-30 minutes, It covers the 3 first acts.
